snippet: The aftermath of a deadly bombing in a southern suburb of Beirut on Thursday was captured in video broadcast by the satellite channel run by Hezbollah, the militant movement and political party based in the area.
abstract: The aftermath of a deadly bombing in a southern suburb of Beirut on Thursday was captured in video broadcast by the satellite channel run by Hezbollah, the militant movement and political party based in the area.

byline.original: By CHRISTINE HAUSER and ROBERT MACKEY

headline.main: Hezbollah TV Video of Beirut Bomb Aftermath
